hooks.command: bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); FILE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.file_path // empty"); if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "\.(tsx|ts|jsx|js|css|json)$"; then npx prettier --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null; fi; if echo "$FILE" | grep -qE "(STATE\.md|CLAUDE\.md|docs/.*\.md)"; then echo "⚠️ 중요 파일 변경. /sync 권장"; fi'

bash -c 'export LANG=en_US.UTF-8; DIRTY=0; for d in C:/dev/01_projects/*/; do if git -C "$d" status --porcelain context/STATE.md 2>/dev/null | grep -q .; then echo "STATE.md uncommitted in $(basename $d). Run /sync before exit."; DIRTY=1; fi; done; if [ $DIRTY -eq 1 ]; then exit 1; fi'
